value: Design for the Embroidery of a Man's Waistcoat of the "Fabrique de St. Ruf", Unfinished

label: Description
value: Left bottom corner: "Running dogs", from which, alternately, flowers and leaves and a bunch of flowers in the bottom center rise, are at the edges. A vine stem with bunches of blue grapes in a scrolling scheme rises from the bottom into the pocket. A bird and a fringed cloth upon boughs. Flower festoons are suspended from a rose bough in the bottom center of the pocket. The greater part of a garland under the pocket has been invalidated by white color.

label: Physical description
value: Graphite, pen and ink, brush and gouache on paper

Design for a Fan Embroidery, Unfinished

label: Description
value: Fan composed of a field of French lilies within overlapping arcs and a lily spray in center framing the monogram "MAC" surmounted by a crown. Fan border of roses and Légion d'Honneur medals at angles. Only left half completed, and drawing cut off slightly right of center. Crown repeated in arc below.

At right is an Indian with a bow, kneeling and pointing at an animal resembling a monkey on a knoll behind which a man with a long moustache crouches. In the foreground is a man's head, pierced by an arrow.

label: Description
value: A woman holds a small child up to look into a peepshow operated by a man in plumed hat. A seated woman plays a lute, at right. Two other children at left, before a trellis arcade. Wide ornamental border composed of scroll motifs, flowers and a canopy at top.

value: Hand colored etching with watercolor and gold on paper

label: Credit line
value: Gift of Eleanor and Sarah Hewitt

label: Description
value: To be continued at top and bottom. Beneath an arch composed of scroll and plant motifs with a Chinese mast at top center are trellis arcades, trees, and flying birds. A candle bracket originating from each lower corner. Head and shoulders of a boy beneath the left one. Bordering line.

label: Provenance

label: Description

label: Description
value: EUROPE, a helmeted woman, with a scepter and a shield, bearing three fleurs-de-lys, is seated on a crouching horse before a pyramid. At left a kneeling woman with a cornucopia; at right, a seated woman surrounded by attributes, the Church, the Military, and the Arts, points with her hand and with dividers to a globe. Trees, a city in the background. Bottom: "a Paris chez Charpentier rue St Jacques"; "L'EUROPE" "Au Cocq Avec Privilege du Roy".

Pierre. Avec Privilege du Roy".
